item.description:
Preparing for the Winter Harvest! Yes, you read that right. Even though it's only June, many of the wonderful-to-harvest-in-January plants will want to be planted in July/August/September. Will you be ready?

LOCATION: David Homa will most likely be hosting in June - we'll tour his place starting at 6pm, talk about his winter harvesting experience, and follow up with the requisite potluck!

Bring any thoughts/ideas/handhouts about winter gardening that will help us all prepare for planting our winter crops.

Let's meet at 6pm to get some daylight time outside followed by potluck/discussion starting around 7:00 or so...all experience levels welcome!

Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring salad or veg or dessert
Last name starting with H-M bring whatever you want
Last name starting with N-S bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with T-Z main or side dish to share

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: June Portland Maine Permaculture Meetup
